caption.title: No difference of total bacterial burden among Ho Chi Minh (HCM), Patilas (PAT) and Orlando (ORL) strains of Aedes aegypti after intrathoracic injection or oral feeding.
caption.p: The microbial load in the MG was determined 10 days after intrathoracic injection (A) or oral feeding (B) by qRT-PCR. Total bacterial 16S rRNA levels were normalized to mosquito Rp49 RNA levels. One dot represents one mosquito gut. The horizontal line represents the median of the results. The results were combined from at least two biologically independent experiments.
